pullRequest.title: [BEAM-5589 BEAM-5590 BEAM-5591] Update Solr dependencies from 5.5.4 to 8.5.2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update Solr from 5.5.4 to 8.5.2.
I also removed a workaround connected to a bug in 5.5.4
I couldn't update to 8.6.2 because it depends on or.restlet 2.4.3 which is not available (2.4.0 currently is the max) : https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.restlet.jee/org.restlet - getting such an error:

Could not find org.restlet.jee:org.restlet.ext.servlet:2.4.3.
Searched in the following locations:/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
- https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/org/restlet/jee/org.restlet.ext.servlet/2.4.3/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
- https://jcenter.bintray.com/org/restlet/jee/org.restlet.ext.servlet/2.4.3/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
- https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/staging/org/restlet/jee/org.restlet.ext.servlet/2.4.3/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
- https://repository.apache.org/snapshots/org/restlet/jee/org.restlet.ext.servlet/2.4.3/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
- https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/releases/org/restlet/jee/org.restlet.ext.servlet/2.4.3/org.restlet.ext.servlet-2.4.3.pom
Required by:
project :sdks:java:io:solr > org.apache.solr:solr-test-framework:8.6.2
project :sdks:java:io:solr > org.apache.solr:solr-core:8.6.2


Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText:
Nit: can this use public static Create createCollection(String collection, int numShards, int numReplicas) to avoid null
https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/blob/master/solr/solrj/src/java/org/apache/solr/client/solrj/request/CollectionAdminRequest.java#L395
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -37,10 +37,8 @@ static void createCollection(
       String collection, int numShards, int replicationFactor, AuthorizedSolrClient client)
       throws Exception {
     CollectionAdminRequest.Create create =
-        new CollectionAdminRequest.Create()
-            .setCollectionName(collection)
-            .setNumShards(numShards)
-            .setReplicationFactor(replicationFactor)
+        CollectionAdminRequest.Create.createCollection(
+                collection, null, numShards, replicationFactor)

commit.message: [BEAM-5589 BEAM-5590 BEAM-5591] Update Solr dependencies from 5.5.4 to 8.5.2

beforeCommit.message: Use createCollection overload without config to avoid passing null

afterCommit.message: [BEAM-5589 BEAM-5590 BEAM-5591] Update Solr dependencies from 5.5.4 to 8.5.2
